casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arris James HINTON. No. 113PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Raleigh, for Arris James Hinton.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 7th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
